Frost Tipped Arctic Otter

  • Card Variation:

    Species

  • Movement Range:

    1

  • Gene:

    Endothermic

  • Motivation:

    Survival

  • Keal Means:
    Sharp Waxy Fur
    organic
    Freezing Razor Teeth
    mineral
  • Keal Means Tolerance:

    1

  • Play Style:

    Your opponent chooses a letter for you, and you choose for them. Name a fat that begins with your letter. Compare the smoke points of the fats. The higher smoke point wins the match.

  • Brawl Power:

    nqTG

  • Habitat:

    mountain

  • History:

    These creatures were created to harvest a special oil with an extreme smoke point. This oil secretes in large amounts from glandular pockets in the animal's skin and forms a cold waxy substance on its fur. While this creature was designed for humane harvest, many have started acquiring a taste for its fatty flesh.

  • Scarcity:
    Founder's Deck
